TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpExtension extends Azure.Media.VideoAnalyzer.Edge.Models.ExtensionProcessorBase

Docs.summary: HTTP extension processor allows pipeline extension plugins to be connected to the pipeline through over the HTTP protocol. Extension plugins must act as an HTTP server. Please see https://aka.ms/ava-extension-http for details.

Docs.param: Node name. Must be unique within the topology.
An array of upstream node references within the topology to be used as inputs for this node.
Endpoint details of the pipeline extension plugin.
Image transformations and formatting options to be applied to the video frame(s) prior submission to the pipeline extension plugin.
